title: ðŸš¨Luke Kuechly shockingly retires from NFL at age 28 - Emergency Podcast (Football 1/14)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Sean Wagner-McGough to react to Luke Kuechly's surprising announcement that he is retiring from the NFL at age 28. The guys go over all of Kuechly's incredible achievements in just 8 seasons in the league, assess how this affects the Panthers moving forward and answer what will surely be a lively debate; is he a Hall of Famer?
